description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Getafe vs Villarreal in the Spanish La Liga
title: Getafe vs Villarreal: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head
title_page: Getafe vs Villarreal: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 6 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt missed. Santi Comesaña (Villarreal) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Juan Foyth with a headed pass following a corner.
Post
Attempt blocked. Álvaro Rodríguez (Getafe) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Peter Federico with a cross.
Post
Attempt missed. Peter Federico (Getafe) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right following a set piece situation.
